critique: The document is a formal executive order regarding the exemption of an employee from compulsory retirement. It expresses a sense of duty and adherence to legal procedures. There is no explicit expression of joy, sadness, fear, disgust, or surprise. However, a very slight sense of duty might be interpreted as a low level of sadness that someone has to work, but it is more neutral. Therefore, the initial scores are all set to 1, indicating a minimal level of these emotions.
